item.title: Resume
item.description: .col4 { columns: 4 100px; /* number of columns and width in pixels*/ -webkit-columns: 4 200px; /* chrome, safari */ -moz-columns: 4 200px; /* firefox */ } .col3 { columns: 3 100px; -webkit-columns: 3 100px; -moz-columns: 3 100px; } .col2 { columns: 2 100px; -webkit-columns: 2 100px; -moz-columns: 2 100px; } #column_container { width: 959px; margin: 0 auto; } Gordon Fleetwood gfleetwood.netlify.com gfleetwood@protonmail.com github.com/gfleetwood New York, NY Professional Experience Data Analyst: New Classrooms 2017 - Present Applied Bayesian Analysis in R to evaluate optimal learning pathways for students Built a Machine Learning model in Python to predict the probability of a student learning specific Mathematical skills Leveraged SQL to pull data for information requests throughout the company Redesigned the ETL pipeline for reporting test results Wrote detailed reports for non-technical project stakeholders Wrote an internal R package to consolidate various data processing tasks Leveraged cloud computing for analyses with large data sets.
